description: Ms. codex. Title from fol. 1a. 20 to 22 lines per page. Written in medium small nastaʻlīq in black ink with use of red. European glazed paper with watermark and light cream paper with laid lines and pulp visible. Fol. 182-215 are inlaid leaves (originally 179 x 126 mm.), with 21 lines to the page. The date given in the colophon refers to these last leaves. Ḥāshīyah and short excerpts on the margins. Catchword on the verso of each leaf. Modern foliation in pencil using Western numerals, counting the first three endleaves as fol. 1-3. Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the upper cover: "ʻAqāʼid 48". Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on fol. 2b: "Ḥāʼ 1247". Copy completed on Saturday 5 Dhū al-Qaʻdah 970 [June 26, 1563] (colophon, fol. 215a). Incipit: المقصد الثاني في الجواهر والاعراض وفيه فصول الاول في الجواهر قدم مباحثها على مباحث الاعراض لان وجود العرض Explicit: واذا ظن كل طايفة انه لم يقم به الآخر اثم الكل تركه هذا آخر ما يتيسر لنا من شرح تجريد الكلام والحمد لله على التوفيق للاتمام
author: Qūshjī, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad, -1474 or 1475
abstract: Commentary on Tajrīd al-ʻaqāʼid by Naṣīr al-Dīn al-Ṭūsī. This copy starts with Maqṣad 2 (see note on the lower corner of fol. 4a).
extent: iii, 212, iii leaves: paper ; 259 x 133 (168 x 61) mm. bound to 258 x 143 mm.
uniform_title: Sharḥ al-Qūshjī ʻalá Tajrīd al-ʻaqāʻid lil-Ṭūsī
شرح القوشجي على تجريد العقاعد للطوسي
provenance: Several ownership statements on fol. 4a, signed Ibn Muḥammad Ṣādiq Muḥammad Ḥasan ; Aḥmad Najīb ibn Aḥmad Ṭāhir [19th cent.] ; Muḥammad Afandī. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: Qūshjī, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad, -1474 or 1475
قوشجي، علي بن محمد
subject: Ṭūsī, Naṣīr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, 1201-1274—Tajrīd al-iʻtiqād.
binding_note: Golden brown leather over paper pastedown for upper and lower covers, fore-edge flap and envelope flap. The covers have a blind-tooled frame consisting of fillets and stamps. Blue and yellow marbled paper pastedowns.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
